1.0.1.en: Deleted energy display, added start- and stoptime for API calls

1.1.0.en: Deleted driver for APsystems web API calls, added support for ECU

1.1.1.en: Changed the fixed number of inverters to the real amount. Poll time reduced from 5 mins to 2.

1.1.2.en: Added extra logging for diagnostic reports.

volgende versie.en: You can now change the IP address and/ or ECU ID

1.1.3.en: You can now change the IP address and/ or ECU ID. Changed the 'power used' into 'power generated' and some minor fixes.

1.1.4.en: App logo changed, firmware version shows, peak power for that day

1.1.5.en: Deleted a line of code that in some cases seem to crash the app

Volgende versie.en: The peak power is now reset every day. Added a setting to pause the ECU polling within a timeframe. Added an input for the ECU polling interval.
